title: UNO Finance Professor M. Kabir Hassan Named Fulbright Scholar - Biz New Orleans
content: UNO Finance Professor M. Kabir Hassan Named Fulbright Scholar  Biz New Orleans
description: NEW ORLEANS — From the University of New Orleans: UNO finance professor M. Kabir Hassan has been selected as a U.S. Fulbright Scholar for 2022-23. He said he will use his award to study small and medium-sized businesses in Saudi Arabia. “My goal is to design a framework that utilizes alternative sources of Judeo-Christian-Islamic modes of financing for small and...
